name: 32Blox
description:
32Blox is a brick-bashing breakout game, built for the 32Blit console. Bounce balls against the bricks to destroy them, catch the powerups and chase the high score in true classic Arcade style!

This is best played with a gamepad (or on the 32Blit itself!), but keyboard controls are available - be aware that the web and desktop versions have some slightly confusing mappings:

Note: For Linux / MacOS users, you will need to have the SDL runtime installed. The Windows version includes this.
